Reviews.Title: CCTV camera cable
Reviews.Author: MrToyman
Reviews.Content: This larger gauge video cable is a must for a long distant installation of hi resolution cameras.  High quality and well made cable.  Prompt shipment with product exactly as advertised.

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and plug ready
Cable functions for bnc connection.
2 Pack of 150 feet video/power cables in white
Power Wire: 20AWG with (1) 2.1mm x 5.5mm Female Power Jack and (1) 2.1mm x 5.5mm Male Power Plug
ProductInfo.Name: 2 Pack of 150ft 150 Feet All-In-One Siamese CCTV Security Camera BNC Video and Power Cable for Surveillance System
